scripts.pypoe:pull: cd ../.. && git subtree pull --squash --prefix=packages/datamine/PyPoE https://github.com/OmegaK2/PyPoE.git dev
scripts.export: bash -c "mkdir -p dist && pypoe_exporter dat json dist/pypoe.json --files $(node src/exportFilenames.js)"
scripts.export:all: bash -c "mkdir -p dist' && pypoe_exporter dat json dist/all.json"
